description: Net visualizes a network, based on simulated forces. It allows for multiple layout and visual configurations (see configuration documentation). Allows for hovering and selecting nodes (with different associated behaviors).
instructions_user: Hover and click on nodes for expanding information and selecting

receives.description: Configuration object, configures nodes and relations appearance, physics simulation parameters and layout. A sub-object (e.g. {physics:{friction:0.5}}) could be sent at any moment, it will only modified the specific parameters. See documentation.txt
node or id of node to be hovered (will behave as if the cursor hovers it)
forces the un-selection of a node (if any is selected, if not the command is unoquous), doesnÂ´t require to send value.

sets a layout, options are: clusters, clusters category (uses category property of nodes), cloud, xy (uses properties x and y of nodes), x (uses property x of nodes), y (uses property y of nodes), free (free nodes from fixed x and/or y positions), free x (frees nodes from x position), free y (frees nodes from y position). See documentation.txt

sends.description: hovered node, sends every time a new node is hovered
selected node, sends every time a new node is selected
sends every time a node is unselected
sends every time the cursor leaves a node
hovered relation, sends every time a new relation is hovered
selected relation, sends every time a new relation is selected
selected pair of node, sends every time a pair of nodes is selected, the value contains an Object with values node0 and node1
